Picture Preview Pane (LabVIEW MathScript Window)

Requires: MathScript RT Module

This pane appears in the Preview Pane field of the LabVIEW MathScript Window. Select Picture from the Display Type pull-down menu to display this pane.

Note  The Display Type pull-down menu appears only after you select a variable from the Variable List.

Use this pane to plot data on an intensity graph.

This pane includes the following components:

  • Color—Specifies the color scheme of the intensity graph.
  • Intensity Graph—Plots the data on an intensity graph.
